title: Pollution Index Map
desc: For this project, my team and I used React and Bootstrap to create a website. The website allows users to monitor the pollution index across Indonesia. While the data is not real-time, it is relatively recent, typically ranging from a few months ago. We retrieve the data through the OpenWeather API, which requires longitude and latitude parameters to specify the geographic location. To facilitate this, we compiled a list of longitude and latitude coordinates for all the provinces in Indonesia.

title: Pokemon Gallery
desc: This is a personal project that I created with React, in this project I learned a lot about how to use API as a data source. The API that this project use is from PokeAPI

title: QHealth Java Swing Project
desc: This project was developed using Java Swing and was worked on by me and my friends for our Object-Oriented Programming assignment. The application allows users to calculate their Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) by inputting their weight, height, and age. It then provides the user with their BMR, calorie needs, and food recommendations based on their calorie requirements.

title: RAAMEN Application
desc: This project, developed by my friends and me for our Pattern Software Design course, was implemented using ASP.NET. While the project prioritized functionality over user interface design, as it wasn't assessed by the instructor, it offers a comprehensive management system for a fictive restaurant named RAAMEN. The system serves both customers and administrators, allowing users to conveniently place orders and browse the available ramen options. Administrators have access to vital features such as generating reports, tracking all RAAMEN transactions, and managing ramen-related actions.

title: Linguanesia Python Project
desc: This project is based on Python and was developed by me and my friends as part of our Artificial Intelligence assignment. In this project, we utilized the MediaPipe library for hand detection and OpenCV2 for real-time image processing. For model training, we employed Google's Teachable Machine. While the model can accurately detect sign language gestures, it faces challenges when distinguishing sign language letters that closely resemble each other.

title: HIMTI Instagram Post
desc: This is a design for HIMTI's official Instagram post showcasing the new organizational hierarchy. I used Figma to create this design with the theme of glass morphism.

title: KATEKIMA Project
desc: This project is based on Laravel Framwork and was worked on by me and my friends as part of our Software Engineering assignment, this project is an inventory management system for a stationery store.

title: Library Application Mockup
desc: This is a mobile mockup design that I created using Figma for my Database Technology assignment. My friends and I developed a library application using Oracle Database.

title: D'HIMTI Poster
desc: This design is for an HIMTI Bandung Instagram post and a certificate related to a tech talk show. I created both the Instagram post and the certificate using Figma.

title: HIMTI Eid Poster
desc: This design is for an HIMTI Bandung Instagram post celebrating Eid. I created this minimalistic design using Figma to beautifully capture the essence of Eid, emphasizing its simplicity and elegance.

title: HIMTI Bandung Instagram Post
desc: This is a design for HIMTI Bandung Instagram post about what to Do's and Don'ts when you are a self-taught programmer that I created using Figma

title: Linguanesia App Mockup
desc: This mockup mobile design is for the Linguanesia App that allow users to translate sign language into text that I created using Figma

title: Cooperative Mobile App Mockup
desc: This partial mockup mobile design is for a cooperative mobile application for Mitra Kasih Hospital that I created using Figma

title: Sulawesi White Pepper Design
desc: This is a design I created using Figma back in 2022 for Sulawesi's white pepper, which my family intended to sell. This simplistic design features a pleasing color palette and a concise way to deliver its message.

title: Personal Website
desc: This personal website was made using Tailwind CSS and React. It showcases my portfolio as interactive cards that can be clicked to display more detailed information about each project. The website's responsive design ensures a seamless experience on various devices.
